comments.author: Matthieu
comments.content:
"When something truly abnormal happens it’s quite different from looking for and expecting abnormal things to happen, or trying to make them happen yourself."

Man, this is truly philosophical. Do you read what you have written before posting it? :p

comments.content: Haha, actually I was falling asleep while typing that, stressful day :P Thanks for reading my blog anyway, though you really shouldn't do it during work hours :P
